assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Rekor Systems, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides intelligent infrastructure solutions and services for transportation management, public safety, and commercial markets in the United States, Canada, and internationally. It offers Rekor Command Roadway Monitoring Core Application and Events Management application for cross-agency incident detection and management; Community Connect application to notify public in real-time of events that are impacting the roadway; Advanced Analytics application for archive incident and event information; Road Conditions application for real-time conditions happening on roadways; and Asset View application allows agencies to integrate with its existing assets on the roadway and showcase these assets in real-time. The company also provides Rekor Discover  Count, Class and Speed application that delivers per vehicle record data and analytics; and Sustainability Planning application that offers cloud-based dashboards and reports the count of EVs and heatmaps for EVs, as well as a breakdown of EV models, greenhouse gas emissions and smog, and other metrics. In addition, it offers Rekor Scout for public safety that provides accurate license plate and vehicle recognition on any IP, traffic, or security camera. Further, the company provides Rekor CarCheck, an AI based vehicle and license plate recognition technology to respond with accurate license plate data, vehicle make, model, body type, and color for commercial applications; and AutoNotice application for contactless compliance that delivers a turnkey information and citation management solution for cities, states, and municipalities for both primary and secondary offenses. Additionally, it offers Rekor Edge Max System, a fixed traffic data collection system; Rekor Edge Pro, a vehicle recognition solution; and Rekor Edge Flex, a portable data collection system. Rekor Systems, Inc. was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Columbia, Maryland.
